thread.title: Agellan Commercial Real Estate Investment Trust Announces April 2018 Monthly Distribution and Details of its First Quarter Conference Call

author: cnbc.com
title: Agellan Commercial Real Estate Investment Trust Announces April 2018 Monthly Distribution and Details of its First Quarter Conference Call

organizations.name: agellan commercial real estate investment trust
united states agellan commercial real estate investment trust

text:
TORONTO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Agellan Commercial Real Estate Investment Trust (“Agellan” or the “REIT”) (TSX: ACR.UN):
NOT FOR DISTRIBUTION TO UNITED STATES NEWSWIRE SERVICES OR FOR DISTRIBUTION IN THE UNITED STATES
Agellan Commercial Real Estate Investment Trust (“Agellan” or the “REIT”) (TSX: ACR.UN) announced today that its Board of Trustees has declared a distribution of $0.0675 per unit for the month of April 2018, representing $0.810 per unit on an annualized basis. The distribution will be payable on May 15, 2018 to unitholders of record as at April 30, 2018.
Agellan offers a distribution reinvestment plan (“DRIP”) to unitholders whereby the participants may elect to have their cash distributions used to purchase trust units of the REIT. Unitholders wishing to participate should contact their investment advisors to enroll in the DRIP.
First Quarter Conference Call
Agellan will hold a conference call to discuss its financial performance for the three-month period ended March 31, 2018 on Tuesday, May 8, 2018 at 2:00 p.m. (Toronto time). The financial results will be released prior to the call.
To access the call, please dial 1-416-641-6104 or 1-800-806-5484 and enter the participant pass code: 6749642. For operator assistance during the call, please press *0.
A replay of the conference call will be available from 5:00 p.m. (Toronto time) on May 8, 2018 until midnight (Toronto time) on June 8, 2018. To access the replay, please call 1-905-694-9451 or 1-800-408-3053 and enter participant pass code: 5261030.
About Agellan Commercial Real Estate Investment Trust
The REIT is an unincorporated, open-ended real estate investment trust established pursuant to a declaration of trust under the laws of the Province of Ontario. The REIT has been created for the purpose of acquiring and owning industrial, office and retail properties in select major urban markets in the United States and Canada.
The REIT’s 44 properties contain 7.0 million square feet of gross leasable area, with the REIT’s ownership interest at 6.7 million square feet. The properties are located in major urban markets in the United States and Canada.
Additional information about the REIT is available at www.agellancommercialreit.com or www.sedar.com .
